TableSpec.Name: MIMED Phone
TableSpec.Description: Stores information about usr um UMHSPHONE records
TableSpec.Author: UM Dev

BooleanField.Description: Indicates this phone number is the primary phone number.
BooleanField.Name: ISPRIMARY

BooleanField.Description: Indicates this phone number should not receive phone calls.
BooleanField.Name: DONOTCALL

SequenceField.Description: Stores the user-defined sequence for phone numbers on a constituent.
SequenceField.Name: SEQUENCE

TextField.Description: Contains additional comments about the information source.
TextField.Name: INFOSOURCECOMMENTS

DateField.Description: The date the phone number becomes valid.
DateField.Name: STARTDATE

DateField.Description: The date the phone number becomes invalid.
DateField.Name: ENDDATE

CodeTableField.Description: The reason code translation ID for do not call.
CodeTableField.Name: DONOTCALLREASONCODEID

ForeignKeyField.Description: The country for this phone number.
ForeignKeyField.Name: COUNTRYID

BooleanField.Description: Indicates this phone number is confidential.
BooleanField.Name: ISCONFIDENTIAL

CheckConstraint.Name: CK_USR_UMHS_PHONE_ENDDATEINVALIDIFPRIMARY
CheckConstraint.CheckExpression: ISPRIMARY=0 or (ISPRIMARY = 1 and ENDDATE is null)
